forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High 13C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High around 55F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Becoming windy overnight. Low 12C. SSE winds at 15 to 25 km/h, increasing to 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy overnight. Low 53F. Winds SE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain. High around 15C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 25mm. Localized flooding is expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High 59F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near an inch. Localized flooding is expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with rain. Low 12C. Winds SSW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. Low 54F. Winds SSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 14C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 57F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 7C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 44F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 13C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High near 55F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies in the evening then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 43F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High 13C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High around 55F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 7C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 44F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 13C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 54F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 44F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 56F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 46F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 56F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.
